duties_responsibilities.duty: Loading and unloading shipments as required, involving constant lifting of heavy boxes.
Operating stock trucks, mechanical jacks, electric pallet jacks, and forklifts in a safe manner throughout the plant.
Preparing products for shipment by weighing, handling, and transportation.
Ensuring compliance with all safety regulations and standards during the loading and unloading process.
Maintaining load stability, avoiding damages, and ensuring driver safety during the packing and loading process.
Cleaning out trucks when necessary and marking/addressing products for proper delivery and condition.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or general education degree (GED) preferred.
3 months experience operating an electric pallet jack or forklift preferred.
